meanings.sent1: The mismoved chair was not in the right spot.
meanings.sent2: The cat looked mismoved after being picked up awkwardly.
meanings.sent3: The mismoved puzzle pieces made the picture look funny.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt mismoved, like a piece out of place in a jigsaw puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The mismoved painting on the wall caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: Moved in a wrong or unsuitable way.
meanings.sent1: The mismoved book fell off the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The flowerpot was mismoved to a shady corner.
meanings.sent3: The mismoved dance steps made the audience giggle.
meanings.sent4: His words felt mismoved, like a melody played out of tune.
meanings.sent5: The mismoved traffic cone caused confusion on the road.
